jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.shortDescription: Join our team to build beautiful, responsive user interfaces using React and modern frontend technologies.
jobs.description: We're looking for a talented Frontend Developer to help us create exceptional user experiences. You'll work with a team of designers and developers to build and maintain responsive web applications using React and modern frontend technologies.
responsibilities: Develop new user-facing features using React.js
Build reusable components and libraries for future use
Translate designs and wireframes into high-quality code
Optimize components for maximum performance across devices
Collaborate with designers, product managers, and other developers
requirements: 3+ years of experience with React.js
Strong proficiency in JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
Experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and modern frontend build pipelines
Knowledge of state management techniques
preferred: Knowledge of testing libraries like Jest or React Testing Library
Experience with frontend frameworks like Next.js

jobs.title: UX Designer
jobs.shortDescription: Help us create intuitive and beautiful user experiences that delight our customers.
jobs.description: We're seeking a creative UX Designer to join our product team. You'll work closely with product managers, developers, and other designers to create intuitive and engaging user experiences across our digital products.
responsibilities: Create user flows, wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity mockups
Conduct user research and usability testing
Analyze user behavior and incorporate feedback into design decisions
Collaborate with developers to ensure designs are implemented correctly
Help establish and maintain design systems and guidelines
requirements: 3+ years of experience in UX/UI design
Proficiency with design tools such as Figma or Sketch
Strong understanding of user-centered design principles
Experience with user research and usability testing
Excellent communication and presentation skills
preferred: Background in product design or interaction design
Experience with animation and motion design

jobs.title: Backend Engineer
jobs.shortDescription: Build and maintain the server-side logic that powers our applications.
jobs.description: We are looking for a Backend Engineer to join our engineering team. You'll be responsible for developing and maintaining the server-side logic, defining and maintaining database schemas, and ensuring high performance and responsiveness to requests from the front-end.
responsibilities: Design and implement server-side logic and APIs
Build efficient, testable, and reusable code
Integrate data storage solutions
Implement security and data protection measures
Collaborate with frontend developers on feature implementation
requirements: 3+ years of experience in backend development
Proficiency in Node.js, Python, or Java
Experience with databases (SQL, NoSQL)
Understanding of server-side templating languages
Basic understanding of frontend technologies
preferred: Knowledge of cloud services (AWS, GCP, or Azure)

jobs.title: Product Manager
jobs.shortDescription: Drive product vision, strategy, and execution to deliver exceptional user experiences.
jobs.description: We're looking for a Product Manager to help define and execute our product strategy. You'll work with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities, define requirements, and deliver features that meet user needs and business objectives.
responsibilities: Define product vision, strategy, and roadmap
Gather and prioritize product requirements
Work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams
Define success metrics and monitor product performance
Conduct market research and competitive analysis
requirements: 3+ years of experience in product management
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and stakeholder management abilities
Experience with agile development methodologies
Data-driven decision making skills
preferred: Technical background or experience working with technical teams
Track record of successful product launches

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.shortDescription: Create and execute marketing campaigns to drive brand awareness and user acquisition.
jobs.description: We're seeking a Marketing Specialist to help grow our user base and build our brand. You'll create and execute marketing campaigns across various channels to drive user acquisition, engagement, and retention.
responsibilities: Plan and execute marketing campaigns across digital channels
Create compelling content for our website, blog, and social media
Analyze campaign performance and optimize for results
Collaborate with product and design teams on marketing initiatives
Stay up-to-date with marketing trends and best practices
requirements: 2+ years of experience in digital marketing
Experience with social media marketing and content creation
Knowledge of SEO and SEM principles
Familiarity with marketing analytics tools
Strong written and verbal communication skills
preferred: Experience with A/B testing and optimization
